name: Gordon Streaman
description:
Gordon Streaman is a newcomer to the world of streaming and gaming, in order to fullfill his mostly intense dreams and wishes of becoming known/popular and make a lot of money in the process, it isn’t going to be that easy! Achieve as many subscribers as possible and become a popular internet celebrity.

Features
- Experience a new and unique gaming experience,
- Explore the apartments,
- Play mini-games on your PC,
- Grow your 'channel', raid other 'channels',
- Connect to your Twitch account and play with your viewers.
